boardgame.name: Michael Jordan's Cosmic Court
boardgame.description: Cosmic Court is a children's game based off of the Warner Brothers movie Space Jam starring Michael Jordan and the Looney Tunes Cartoon Characters. You play as Michael Jordan, spinning and moving around the 3D board. This game could be classified as a low dexterity game, as you attempt to make "shots" by throwing a small purple basketball at the court to make a basket.
